lines: Lord Haurchefant is mindful in the extreme with regards to his food. He is often fond of saying, “Food that physicks makes flesh proof against cold.”

What is worse than feeling as though the whole world is against you? Why, feeling as though the whole world is against you and being hungry. While it is not within my power to remedy the former, I can put a warm meal in you.
Limited though it may be, we at Camp Dragonhead would offer you what support we can in this difficult time. As Lord Haurchefant's honored friend, you shall ever have a place at our hearth.
It's about time they stopped spreading those awful rumors about you! Oh, but I do hope this doesn't mean you won't drop in anymore.
When he dined with us, he would never fail to ask us about our day, and favor us with that smile of his when we did...
<sniffle> <sob> It's...it's all just a bad dream, isn't it!? When I wake up, it'll be the way it was, won't it!?
I think the ceremony was just the thing to help everyone move forward.
There will doubtless be times when we remember and weep, but I should think they will grow fewer and further between.
<sniffle> <sob> Hm? Oh, I'm sorry, it's just that... In the quieter moments, all the memories come rushing back.
Were Lord Haurchefant still here, he might make some good-natured quip about my tears spoiling the broth! When I think about things that way, I suppose he'll never really leave us. Not really.

obj.n: ディアストーカーハット
アーティザンエプロン
アルドゴートダックビル
